name: Zombie Camera 3D Shooter - AR Zombie Game
name_original: Zombie Camera 3D Shooter - AR Zombie Game
description:
Zombie Camera 3D Shooter. This simulator game is the perfect combination of zombie games, ar shooting games, weapon games and shooting games. Now you have the possibility to make your own zombie movie with your friends starring in the main roles. It is quite simple and we are sure that you will have a lot of fun with one of the most interesting gun shooting games.

Try and you will see how much fun you will have with this zombie shooting game. So, choose the zombie you like the most, pick your weapon from our selection of guns and let the fun begin. If you wanted to make your own zombie movie or you are just a fan of gun games and ar shooting games or just want to have a virtual shooting experience, then you must try our zombie app.

You can visit us on:
